name: @bbass80/design-tokens
description: Design tokens package with Style Dictionary transforms for DTCG format

scripts.build:css: node -e "const {StyleDictionary, config} = require('./config.js'); const sd = StyleDictionary.extend(config); sd.buildPlatform('css');"
scripts.build:scss: node -e "const {StyleDictionary, config} = require('./config.js'); const sd = StyleDictionary.extend(config); sd.buildPlatform('scss');"
scripts.build:js: node -e "const {StyleDictionary, config} = require('./config.js'); const sd = StyleDictionary.extend(config); sd.buildPlatform('js');"
scripts.build:react-native: node -e "const {StyleDictionary, config} = require('./config.js'); const sd = StyleDictionary.extend(config); sd.buildPlatform('reactNative');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
